A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
First ever post or review!!!!
This is was the last Star Wars movie I will ever watch.
I have read every book\, old and new cannon. I have seen every movie and watched every cartoon. The Last Jedi made no sense! The story was horrible! The Force Awaken left storyline holes that the books and the Last Jedi never addressed. Made they should have kept one director for the whole trilogy. The directorial differences from each movie really shows. The new trilogy movies don't add to each other like you would think. 
The Last Jedi movie left characters undeveloped\, added more hole to the story line from the Force Awaken in the new trilogy and even the CGI was weak at time.

I don't know if the critics on rotten tomatoes got paid off to give this movie a 93% but fire them all\, they either don't know star wars or have got paid to to give this movie good review!!!!
